sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: 天然記念物クラスの枝振りが見事な桜や梅、歴史のある桜や梅などの下では茶席が設けられる事が多い。
sen.e: When hanami is held under a cherry tree or plum tree with natural treasure-level beautiful foliages or a historical cherry tree or plum tree, a tea-ceremony place is often established.
When hanami is held under a cherry tree or plum tree with beautiful natural treasure-level blossoms or a historical cherry tree or plum tree, a tea-ceremony place is often set up.
When hanami is held under a cherry tree or plum tree which is designated a natural treasure, or a historical cherry tree or plum tree, a tea-ceremony place is often set up.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。スペース補足しました。

sen.j: 実際に日本国内における桜の花見はソメイヨシノを対象としているところが多い。
sen.e: In fact, the purpose of holding hanami in Japan is to enjoy viewing Someiyoshino in many areas.
The purpose of holding hanami in Japan is to enjoy viewing Someiyoshino trees in many areas.
The most hanami in Japan is to enjoy viewing Someiyoshino trees in many areas.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。スペースなどをのぞきました。

sen.j: しかしながら、全国のほとんどのソメイヨシノが寿命を迎えていると言われている。
sen.e: Meanwhile, most of Someiyoshino trees are likely to come to the end of their lives all over Japan.
Most Someiyoshino trees are likely coming to the end of their lives all over Japan.
A majority of the Someiyoshino trees around Japan are getting old.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。スペースなどをのぞきました。

sen.j: この為、現在多くの公園などで桜の植え替えが行われており、これにより開花時期が大きく異なっている。
sen.e: Because of this, replacement of old Someiyoshino trees with new ones has been implemented in many parks, and the time of blooming differs very much.
Because of this, replacement of old Someiyoshino trees with young trees has been implemented in many parks, and the time they bloom varies quite a bit.
Because of this, old Someiyoshino trees have been replaced with young trees in many parks, and the time they bloom varies significantly.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: 例えば、画像のともやま公園ではソメイヨシノの他に河津桜、吉野桜などを交互に植える等の桜並木の延命作業を行っている。
sen.e: Taking Tomoyama Park, displayed, for instance, they try to make the useful life of the trail lined with numerous cherry trees longer through the efforts of alternate planting Someiyoshino trees, Kawazu cherry trees (定訳不明) and Yoshino cherry trees.

Taking Tomoyama Park, displayed, for example, an attempt to extend the life of a trail lined with numerous cherry trees is accomplished through the efforts of alternately planting Someiyoshino trees, Kawazu cherry trees (定訳不明) and Yoshino cherry trees.

For example in the Tomoyama Park (see picture) an attempt to extend the life of a trail lined with numerous cherry trees is accomplished through the efforts of alternately planting Someiyoshino trees, Kawazu cherry trees and Yoshino cherry trees.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。補足しました。

sen.j: この為、開花時期の異なる木が混在するなど、僅かながら花見の時期も異なり始めている。
sen.e: As a result of the mixture of cherry trees whose blooming time is different, there has been a slight change to the period of hanami.
Because the mixture of cherry trees bloom at different times, there has been a slight change in the period of hanami.
Because the various cherry trees bloom at different times, there has been a slight change in the period of hanami.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: 花見をする前から、広い場所を占有する団体がいる。
sen.e: There are groups of people who occupy the large space for hanami, much ahead of the scheduled time.
There are groups of people who occupy the large spaces for hanami, well ahead of schedule.
Some organizations stake out large spaces for hanami well ahead of schedule.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: 花見中に、カラオケや、火気の使用、喫煙など周りの人に迷惑や危険を与えたり法律を守らない人がいる。
sen.e: There are people who cause disturbances or dangers such as karaoke, fire or smoking to other viewers and break laws.
There are people who cause disturbances or danger such as karaoke, fire or smoking bothering other viewers and breaking laws.
Some revelers cause disturbances or danger such as karaoke, fire or smoking, and their behavior bothers other viewers and breaks laws.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。スペル修正しました。

sen.j: 花見の後に、飲食物やゴミを放置している人がいる。
sen.e: There are people who have left their garbage uncollected after the party.
There are people who have left their garbage after the party.
Some picnickers fail to clean up after the party.
